original_title: Meat Loaf: Bat Out Of Hell - The Original Tour
overview: This concert from the Stadthalle Offenbach in Germany was filmed on June 11th. 1978 for the German Rockpalast TV series and perfectly captures the raw excitement of the original Bat Out Of Hell tour with Meat Loaf dominating the stage and the album s songwriter Jim Steinman contributing heavily.
title: Meat Loaf: Bat Out Of Hell - The Original Tour
